title.narrative: Innovation Project through Digitalization, Promotion of Green Jobs
Innovation Project through Digitalization, Promotion of Green Jobs...

description.narrative:
MFC (Mali-Folkecenter Nyetaa) has applied to Sida for funding of 75 million SEK to carry out the "Innov-Rec" Project (Innovation Project through Digitalization, Promotion of Green Jobs) in Mali during the period 2021-2024.
The so-called Innov.Rec program is designed to support the development and scale of locally relevant climate technologies in Mali. It aims to foster processes by which new ideas are developed to meet societal, environmental and economic needs in the time of climate change. Harnessing opportunities offered by the traditional sectors of agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry and fisheries, health and sanitation, energy and transport, manufacturing, and services market, to name a few, local entrepreneurs are expected to creating new goods and services that embody climate technology. The program will bring incubation, capacity building and financing options to local entrepreneurs who develop innovations to meet the challenges of climate change. Through 5 Local Resources Poles (LRPs), deconcentrated structures of MFC, that will be set-up in-country and the capital city’s Technopole (based in Bamako) holistic support will be provided as well as the development, deployment, and transfer of locally relevant climate technologies. The program will also help local entrepreneurs to connect with sources of finance, providing them with the means to innovate. To do this, the program will rely on a multi-actor process involving both public actors, local entrepreneurs and civil society organizations.
The Innov-Rec program seeks to contribute to environmental and economic resilience with links to peace and social cohesion. The program will be implemented according to the 3 axes as follows:
Axis 1: employability and vocational training in the face of the challenges of climate change (green jobs, renewable energies and the productive use of these energies in jobs with high potential).
Axis 2: Digitalization, inclusive finance and innovation for local economic growth, Local Resource Poles for the benefit of entrepreneurs, NGOs, associations, GIE and microfinance cooperatives).
Axis 3: Consultation and inclusive dialog framework for climate resilience, and for peace, security and social cohesion at local and regional level.
The intervention’s total budget financed solely by Sida is 76,5 M SEK, out of which 75 MSEK will be borne by MFC and the remaining 1,5 MSEK will be managed by the Embassy for final evaluation purpose.

MFC (Mali-Folkecenter Nyetaa) has applied to Sida for funding of 75 million SEK to carry out the "Innov-Rec" Project (Innovation Project through Digitalization, Promotion of Green Jobs) in Mali during the period 2021-2024.

tag.narrative: 1.5 - By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

1.5 - Till 2030 bygga upp motståndskraften hos de fattiga och människor i utsatta situationer och minska deras utsatthet och sårbarhet för extrema klimatrelaterade händelser och andra ekonomiska, sociala och miljömässiga chocker och katastrofer.
13.1 - Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.
13.1 - Stärka motståndskraften mot och förmågan till anpassning till klimatrelaterade faror och naturkatastrofer i alla länder.

15.1 - By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements.

15.1 - Till 2020 bevara, återställa och hållbart använda ekosystem på land och i sötvatten och deras ekosystemtjänster, särskilt skogar, våtmarker, berg och torra områden, i enlighet med de skyldigheter som anges i internationella överenskommelser.

2.3 - By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment.

2.3 - Till 2030 fördubbla jordbrukets produktivitet och inkomster för småskaliga livsmedelsproducenter, i synnerhet kvinnor, ursprungsfolk, familjejordbrukare, boskapsskötande nomader samt fiskare, inklusive genom säker och lika tillgång till mark, andra produktionsresurser och insatsvaror, kunskap, finansiella tjänster och marknader samt möjligheter till värdeskapande och sysselsättning utanför jordbruket.
4.4 - By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

4.4 - Till 2030 väsentligen öka det antal ungdomar och vuxna som har relevanta färdigheter, däribland tekniska färdigheter och yrkeskunnande, för sysselsättning, anständigt arbete och entreprenörskap.
5.b - Enhance the use of enabling technology, in particular information and communications technology, to promote the empowerment of women.
5.b - Öka användningen av gynnsam teknik, i synnerhet informations- och kommunikationsteknik, för att främja kvinnors egenmakt

7.b - By 2030, expand infrastructure and upgrade technology for supplying modern and sustainable energy services for all in developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their respective programmes of support.

7.b - Till 2030 bygga ut infrastrukturen och uppgradera tekniken för att leverera moderna och hållbara energitjänster till alla i utvecklingsländerna, i synnerhet de minst utvecklade länderna och små önationer under utveckling.

8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
